SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.createdt DESC) NUM, a.* FROM ( SELECT p.*,u.PLANTSNAME , f.*, RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY p.POSTNO ORDER BY p2.NO) AS rank FROM post p LEFT OUTER JOIN USERTOPLANTS u ON (p.plantscateno = u.plantscateno) LEFT OUTER JOIN POSTFILES p2 ON p.POSTNO = p2.POSTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN FILES f ON p2.NO = f.NO ) a WHERE RANK = 1 ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4
